abstract: Mr. Peebler turned a small Omaha advertising company called Bozell & Jacobs into a global powerhouse.
snippet: Mr. Peebler turned a small Omaha advertising company called Bozell & Jacobs into a global powerhouse.
lead_paragraph: Charles D. Peebler Jr., who turned a small Omaha advertising company called Bozell & Jacobs into a global powerhouse, died Saturday at his home in Indian Wells, Calif. He was 72.

headline.main: Charles Peebler, Ad Executive, Dies at 72
headline.print_headline: Charles Peebler, Ad Executive, Dies at 72

abstract: When Eric D. Herschmann was named last May as president and chief operating officer of Southern Union, a Houston-based natural gas company, he continued to be a partner at the law firm of Kasowitz, Benson, Torres & Friedman. Southern Union also happens to be a very good client of the law firm, where Mr. Herschmann has been a partner since 1996, according to the company’s recent proxy.
lead_paragraph: When Eric D. Herschmann was named last May as president and chief operating officer of Southern Union, a Houston-based natural gas company, he continued to be a partner at the law firm of Kasowitz, Benson, Torres & Friedman. Southern Union also happens to be a very good client of the law firm, where Mr. Herschmann has been a partner since 1996, according to the company’s recent proxy.

headline.main: At Southern Union, a President With Ties to a Law Firm
